name: Guardian
description: A Human League city has suffered a demonic invasion. Heroes protect the city and fight back against the demons.You need to protect your base and destroy the enemy base.Own hero has four magic, w, s, e, d keys to release magic attack, destroy the enemy's main base you will win to enter the next level. You can also click on the four magic icons on the right to release the magic.The magic attacks are very powerful, and the enemy heroes will get stronger and stronger. As long as the main base is not destroyed, the heroes will come back to life every once in a while.
